quickstart.title: Configuration files
quickstart.header: Track changes in the configuration files on this Splunk server, or on any other server in your network.

option.title: Get the Splunk for *nix app
option.summary: This app collects Unix/Linux data, and provides predefined dashboards and searches built on this data.

option.title: Use Splunk's file change monitoring feature
option.summary: Configure Splunk to watch for changes in your file system.

option.title: Get the Splunk for Windows app
option.summary: This app allows you to select from preconfigured Windows event log, performance, registry and Active Directory monitoring inputs on Windows machines. It also provides predefined dashboards and searches.

option.title: Set up Windows registry monitoring
option.summary: Configure Splunk to read data from the Windows registry.

option.title: Watch any configuration file on this Splunk server
option.summary: Configure Splunk to index any file it can access.

option.title: Watch configuration files on another server
option.summary: Use Splunk's universal forwarder to send configuration file changes from any machine to your Splunk server.
